verses.roman:
jaya nityānanda-candra jaya caitanyera prāṇa
tomāra caraṇāravinde bhakti deha' dāna

synonyms: jaya—all glories; nityānanda-candra—to Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; jaya—all glories; caitanyera prāṇa—to the life and soul of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tomāra caraṇa-aravinde—at Your lotus feet; bhakti—devotional service; deha'-please give; dāna—the gift.
translation: All glories to Lord Nityānanda, who is the life and soul of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. My dear Lord, kindly give me engagement in devotional service at Your lotus feet.
